title: Deep Dive into Adaptive Controller Logic and Feedback Fading
detail: The current claims mention an adaptive controller and feedback fading (c0002, c0004), but lack specific details on the algorithms, rules, and thresholds governing these adaptive adjustments. To fully understand the system's sophistication and potential clinical impact, a deeper exploration of the adaptive controller's logic and the precise mechanisms of feedback fading is required.

title: Quantify the Impact of Specific Technical Solutions on System Stability
detail: While claim c0003 identifies solutions for anchor drift and noisy tilt estimation, the evidence does not quantify the effectiveness of these solutions. A hypothesis is that these solutions significantly improve system stability and reduce the impact of these challenges. Further investigation is needed to measure the reduction in anchor drift and improvement in tilt estimation accuracy post-implementation.

title: Validate Real-time Dashboard Metrics and Trial-by-Trial Updates
detail: Claim c0002 states that a projected dashboard will display specific metrics updated per trial. However, the evidence only partially lists these metrics and does not confirm their real-time update frequency or accuracy. A next step is to verify the complete list of dashboard metrics and confirm that they are indeed updated in real-time for each trial, providing immediate feedback to clinicians and patients.

title: Elaborate on the Clinical Application and User Experience of Adaptive Feedback
detail: Claim c0001 suggests potential clinical application, and c0002 mentions adaptive difficulty adjustments and fading feedback. However, the specific ways in which these adaptive features will be tailored to different stroke patient profiles and how they contribute to a motivating and effective user experience are not fully detailed. Further clarification is needed on how the adaptive controller's output translates into tangible benefits for stroke rehabilitation and patient engagement.

title: Confirm Scope and Completion of Unity Project Deliverables
detail: Claim c0003 outlines specific deliverables for the Unity project, including a functional MX Ink tracing sample with haptic ticks and a one-tap calibration UI. The evidence does not confirm the completion or the exact scope of these deliverables. A crucial next step is to obtain confirmation and potentially demonstrations of these specific Unity project components to validate the project's progress and readiness.
